alert.note: Alert for Crowley County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:23PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Crowley County through 700 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Ordway, or 30 miles northwest of La Junta. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Crowley County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
